text: Ese (abahakanyi) ntibatambagira isi ngo barebe uko iherezo ry’ababa- banjirije ryagenze? Bari abanye- mbaraga kubarusha, banahinga isi bakayibyaza umusaruro kubarusha, ndetse bakanayubaka kurusha uko bo bayubaka. Banagezweho n’intumwa zabo zibazaniye ibimenyetso bigaragara (ariko barazihinyura, maze Allah arabarimbura). Allah ntiyigeze abarenganya, ahubwo nibo ubwabo bihemukiye
